page.title: 15MEDIA IN NEWPORT.
page.content:
The media is covered by newspapers,magazines, radio and television.
All the popular papers and magazines are available but they do not give much information about the local area. The Newport and Cwmbran Admag,the Newport Free Press and the Newport Post are free papers available in Newport. Newspapers available are the South Wales Argus, the South Wales Echo and the Western Mail.The Admag and Free Press and the South Wales Argus are printed in Newport. The Post,Echo and Western Mail are printed in Cardiff.
Newport has very good media coverage and it is satisfactory for the people who live here.
